entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 11.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 30.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
